RecordRequestDefinition.description: This is a request to either get or delete an object. This is reused for a

id.description: ID of Record

Email.title: Email Definition
Email.description: This is a Email. An email is a event that sends a specific email to a user or group of users.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

status.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

leadID.description: Lead ID to send email to

EmailCampaign.title: Email Campaign Definition
EmailCampaign.description: This is a Email Campaign. An email campaign is a workflow of emails to be sent in an order and segments the lead list.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

status.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

Lead.title: Lead Definition
Lead.description: Leads are Residences with Contact Info.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

status.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

Order.title: Order Definition
Order.description:
An order is a record that has the status of an installment as well as a status on the Contracts and Payment.

Orders will also have all the measurements, Q&A, and Cost Estimates

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

status.description: Status of the order through the worflow

Product.title: Product Definition
Product.description: This is a Product definition. These are the different options and selections you may do as a SalesPerson or a Production Memeber.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

status.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

forms.description: Where to store the data for calculations, as well as the most essentials, their Social Media account.

productEstimate.description: Salesperson form to entry in basic data and estimations

estimatePricing.description: All product estimate inputs mapped to pricing values

orderEstimate.description: Order measurements and other factors inputs.

Interest.title: Interest Definition
Interest.description:
Interest is the Edge between lead and product. It is to indicate interest in the product.

Interest is what the lead is interested in when they schedule an appointment.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

status.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

Residence.title: Residence Definition
Residence.description: This is a Residence. A residence is a house that is a part of the routes that Canvasers go on, but we have no personal information on them yet.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

status.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

latlong.description: Latitude and Longitude of the address/home

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

Contract.title: Contract Definition
Contract.description: This is a Contract. It will be taking an order and turning it into a signable PDF on HelloSign.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

status.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

helloSign.description: All properties needed for Hello Sign legal signing.

Message.title: Message Definition
Message.description: A Conversation is a organized list of messages with meta data between two user, or a team of users.

user.description: Who sent the message. Can be thought of as where

status.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

Note.title: Note Definition
Note.description:
This is a Note record son a potential lead.

|Direction|Types|
|---------|-----|
|From|Residence, Lead|

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

status.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

Route.title: Route Definition
Route.description: This is a Route. Everyday the Canvasers hit new houses. For each house, they add a Residence to their daily route. Over time we can use this data to generate routes for the canvasers that are more efficient.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

status.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

Answer.description: Did the residence answer the door?

Lead.description: Did the residence, lead into a new Lead?

Group.title: Group Definition
Group.description: This is a Group. The group is the major structure behind permissions and tenants. Inside the web app you can switch between different views for each team you are apart of and for your view as well.

id.description:
This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

Group ID

permissions.description: Array of permissions for the group of users

users.description: An array of all the teams

groups.description: array of group ids for sub groups

Timeclock.title: Timeclock Definition
Timeclock.description: This is a Timeclock. A timeclock is a set of clock-ins and clock-outs for that have happened for a single date.

id.description: ID will be the `UserID|UnixEpochDay` format

status.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

timestamps.description: Array of clock ins and clock outs.

ts.description: Timestamp from DB from when they clocked in or out

Task.title: Task Definition
Task.description: This is a Task. A task is anything that needs to be completed by a employee.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

user.description: User to assign the task to

assigner.description: The person that has assigned this task.

status.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

description.description: Description of task that needs completing

activity.description: Activity to do for the task to complete

startDate.description:
> Start is UNIX day

Start of the first billing period

endDate.description:
> Start is UNIX day

Start of the first billing period

Timeoff.title: Time Off Definition
Timeoff.description: This is the record to either request time off, reject a time off request, or accept a time off request.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

oneTimeRequest.description: A request for a single time off work

recurringRequest.description:
A request to recurring/weekly time off. 

Days can be split in halfs. So you are given the chance to input 4 half days off.

repeatFor.description: Number of weeks to repeat this time off

customReason.description: If they need a custom reason

Layout.title: Layout Definition
Layout.description: This is the styling and display settings for a user.

minisidebar.description: If it it's a Mini Sidebar Vs the Full Sidebar

dir.description: The direction the page is read. Left-to-Right or Right-to-Left

sideBar.description: Whether or not to display the navigation sidebar

topBar.description: Whether or not to display the navigation topbar

template.description: This will be an HTML template that allows you to use inputs and fill out variables inside the template.

valuesForTemplate.description: Values need to complete the template into an email.

Appointment.title: Appointment Definition
Appointment.description: These are appointments for a user and/or lead.

toDate.description: End Date Time or if no `fromDate` then this is the time of the appointment

additionalProperties.description: Idk what is all going in here so ____

Aggregate.description: This is a Aggregate Record. Each day anytime a record is created or updated that event is recorded in a daily aggregate record. Each user has a different aggregate and you can group them together by groups to create reports, or group them together using dates for a scorecard.
Aggregate.title: Aggregate Definition

ReportTemplate.title: Report Template Definition
ReportTemplate.description: Definition of Report. A Report is made up of many score cards.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

fromDate.description: The report will from the `fromDate` until the `toDate`

toDate.description: The report will from the `fromDate` until the `toDate`

groups.description: Group report is being ran on

name.description: Name of the Label in the Marketing Graph to Segment Population

PreviousOrder.title: Previous Order Definition
PreviousOrder.description: Marketing Vertex that keeps track of previous orders a lead has made.

employeesInvolvedIds.description: IDS of all employees user involved in order.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

metaData.description: Meta Data is the aggregates, averages, and min/max for scores

Score.title: Score Definition
Score.description: Definition of a Score Record. Many of these make up a single Score Card. A Report is made of many Score Cards.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

operatePath.description: Path string to grab the data from

operation.description: Operation to do on path strings attribute value.

weight.description: How much is this value weighted

minimum.description: What is the minimum required for a single scores timerange

goal.description: Goal to hit with value from operation mapped over operatePath

IDReferenceObject.title: ID Reference Object
IDReferenceObject.description: ID reference object, mainly used in definitions where the definition holds the ID to access another definition for more details.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

TaskTemplate.title: Task Template Definition
TaskTemplate.description: Template of a task prefilled to assign to a User in your group.

Area.title: Area Definition
Area.description: An area is an assigned GeoJSON to a group or user to canvas at a certain time. It will be attached to a task.

Job.title: Job Definition
Job.description: A job is how the Midtown Homes system tracks the progress of the actual installation.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

JobTemplate.title: Job Template
JobTemplate.description: Template to customize a Job record.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

Payment.title: Payment Definition
Payment.description: Record to record if a client has made a payment or not.

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.

quote.description: The inverse of how much % they get returned from selling.

commission.description: Commission payed to salesman/canvasser for finishing sale

PhoneNumber.title: Phone Number Definition
PhoneNumber.description:
All the marketing/legal information about a specific phone number. 

**Any edits to this schema should be recorded in the .MarketSharp schema to help me move the old data over.**

id.description: This is optional type, Do **NOT** use if inserting a new record.
